img_above_text:
When the queen of spiders finally falls to your assault, she'll beat a hasty retreat to return to wherever she's hidden the Sage's Relic. You'll need to follow quickly, because a literal spider army will appear to give chase!
Violet Spider
img_below_text:
Quickly run toward the cave entrance on the far side, and don't stop sprinting for anything.
![Wukong LowerHollow 87.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_LowerHollow_87.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a moment from the game where the player character, armed with a staff, is kneeling in a dimly lit cave filled with cobwebs and an overwhelming swarm of spiders in the background. The HUD displays collected materials, including a "Spider Leg," and the player's resources such as "Will" and "Refined Iron Sand." This scene follows the defeat of the spider queen and sets the stage for a high-stakes chase sequence, emphasizing urgency and danger.
